FuncDef: This command configures an end-point IP address for a GRE tunnel carrying Ethernet payload that is to be terminated on a PW SAP. It also associates this IP address with the FPE object that is providing cross-connect logic between the tunnel and the PW port. This IP address fully supports ICPM protocols such as PING, traceroute, and others.

ParaDef.Info: The tunnel end-point IP address in the SR OS node.
The tunnel end-point IPv6 address in the SR OS node.
The FPE ID that is providing cross-connect service between the GRE tunnel and the PW port. Values-1 to 64.
